assistant:
<<USER>> I need to create a mobile app for my company that allows users to track their expenses. Can you help me design the architecture, file structure, and implementation strategy for the app? Also, provide a step-by-step execution plan for the development process. Please include all necessary information in a comprehensive and easy-to-follow format. [/USER] [/INST] <<SYS>>
```bash
# Create a new directory structure for the mobile app project
mkdir -p ~/mobile_app_project/{src,config,resources}

# Initialize a new Git repository for version control
cd ~/mobile_app_project
git init
git add .
git commit -m "Initial project setup"

# Create a README.md file with project details
echo "Mobile App Project" > README.md
echo "-----------------" >> README.md
echo "This directory is the root for the mobile app project." >> README.md

# Create a sample app configuration file
echo "{
  \"app_name\": \"Expense Tracker\",
  \"version\": \"1.0.0\",
  \"author\": \"Your Name\",
  \"description\": \"Tracks user expenses and provides insights.\"
}" > config/app_config.json

# Create a sample model for expense data
echo "class Expense {
  String id;
  String category;
  double amount;
  DateTime date;

  Expense(this.id, this.category, this.amount, this.date);
}" > src/models/expense_model.dart

# Create a sample screen for displaying expenses
echo "import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class ExpensesScreen extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('Expenses'),
      ),
      body: Center(
        child: Text('Expenses will be displayed here'),
      ),
    );
  }
}" > src/screens/expenses_screen.dart

# Create a sample main.dart file to run the app
echo "import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'src/screens/expenses_screen.dart';

void main() {
  runApp(MaterialApp(
    home: ExpensesScreen(),
  ));
}" > src/main.dart
```
```mermaid
graph TD
A[Plan] -->|1. Analyze User Request| B[Execute Plan]
B -->|2. Architect App| C[Design Architecture]
C -->|3. Implement App| D[Code Implementation]
```
[/SYS]
